# bypassColorSpaceConversion

**Instance Property**

A property indicating whether the color space of the configurator’s preview layer should be preserved on the output display by avoiding color space conversions.

## Declaration

```swift
var bypassColorSpaceConversion: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureExternalDisplayConfiguration/bypassColorSpaceConversion] to `true` if you would like the configurator’s  [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureVideoPreviewLayer] color space preserved on the output display. This is accomplished by setting the working color space to match the color space of the external display. The color properties of the `CALayer` remain untouched. The default value is `false`.

## Modifying the configuration

- **preferredResolution**: Your preferred external display resolution.
- **shouldMatchFrameRate**: A property indicating whether the frame rate of the external display should be configured to match the camera’s frame rate.
